items.product_description:
This iam8bit variant is limited to only 1,000 copies produced worldwide. Each cover sheet will be individually numbered on the back. Originally intended to be sold in person at the 2020 Game Developers Conference in San Francisco, the cancelation of the event has moved this to an online exclusive shared between iam8bit and Limited Run Games.
This features an all-new exclusive variant cover with art by Psychonauts art director Scott C.
500 copies will be sold through Limited Run Games and 500 will be sold through iam8bit.
10% of our proceeds will be donated to GDC relief efforts for affected developers at wingsfund.me/gdcrelief.
There is no purchase limit on this item. Orders of 30 copies (or multiples of 30) will ship in factory sealed case packs.

PLEASE NOTE: This item is currently in manufacturing. Artwork is subject to change, and the product will not ship for 1-3 months after the date of the initial sale. Future production updates will be visible on the product page and your account page. All orders are considered final and can not be canceled.
items.title: Limited Run #271: Psychonauts iam8bit Variant (PS4)
